text: Kandi (ababangikanyamana) ntabwo bahaye Allah icyubahiro kimukwiye, ubwo bavugaga bati “Nta muntu n’umwe Allah yagize icyo ahishurira.” Vuga uti “None se ni nde wahishuye igitabo Musa yazanye, cyari urumuri n’umuyoboro ku bantu nuko mukakigira impapuro (zitatanye), mugaragaza zimwe inyinshi mukazihisha? Kandi (binyuze muri Qur’an, abemera) mwigishijwe ibyo mutari muzi, yaba mwe cyangwa abakurambere banyu.” Vuga uti “Ni Allah (wahishuye icyo gitabo).” Maze ubareke bishimishe mu biganiro byabo bidafite umumaro
